message.content:
cs.AR, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.ET, cs.SE 

This paper discusses the concept of disaggregated servers and focuses on the trade-off between cost and performance of building a disaggregated memory system. It also mentions the emergence of very large datacenters and the importance of datacenter efficiency, which are topics related to computer architecture (cs.AR) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also constructs a cost model, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). Additionally, the use of optical interconnects and silicon photonics relates to electronic devices and circuits (cs.ET), and the paper discusses the benefits of modularity and resource utilization, which are topics related to software engineering (cs.SE).
